settings.title: Privacy Policy
settings.content:
Information We Collect

We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, place an order, subscribe to our newsletter, or contact us. This information may include your name, email address, shipping address, phone number, and payment information.

How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to:

  • Process and fulfill your orders
  • Communicate with you about your orders and our services
  • Send you marketing communications (with your consent)
  • Improve our products and services
  • Prevent fraud and ensure security

Information Sharing

We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with service providers who help us operate our business, such as payment processors and shipping companies.

Data Security

We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

Your Rights

You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also opt-out of marketing communications at any time. Contact us to exercise these rights.

Shipping Methods

We offer several shipping options to meet your needs:

  • Standard Shipping: 5-7 business days (Free for orders over $50)
  • Express Shipping: 2-3 business days ($15.99)
  • Overnight Shipping: 1 business day ($29.99)

Processing Time

Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days. You will receive a confirmation email with tracking information once your order has shipped.

Shipping Restrictions

We currently ship within the United States only. We do not ship to P.O. boxes or APO/FPO addresses.

International Shipping

International shipping is not currently available. We are working to expand our shipping options to serve customers worldwide.

settings.title: Return Policy
settings.content:
30-Day Return Policy

We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you're not happy with your order, you can return it within 30 days of receipt for a full refund or exchange.

Return Conditions

To be eligible for a return, items must be:

  • Unopened and in original packaging
  • In the same condition as when you received them
  • Accompanied by the original receipt or proof of purchase

Return Process

To initiate a return:

  • Contact our customer service team at returns@aquapure.com
  • Provide your order number and reason for return
  • We will provide you with a return shipping label
  • Pack the items securely and ship them back to us

Refunds

Once we receive and inspect your return, we will process your refund within 5-7 business days. The refund will be issued to your original payment method.
